title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer - Seasons 7 and Pilot
description:
Buffy The Vampire Slayer - Seasons 7 and Pilot


So this is my last â€˜Buffyâ€™ recap and even Iâ€™m ready for them to end. Season 7 is such a weird-ass season of â€˜Buffy.â€™ First of all, it drags like crazy. They talk about nothing for like, five episodes. I kind of hate this season. Even the dialogue doesnâ€™t feel up to the usual snuff. Everything becomes about Spike, for some reason, and characters I cared about are given anti-climactic brush-offs. Itâ€™s very unsatisfying. The show also introduces like, 500 new characters, shoves them into Buffyâ€™s house and then doesnâ€™t explain anything about them except for a few.

That said, Faith comes back! We see Angel again briefly. Thereâ€™s a lot of good series wrap up. But I just wasnâ€™t into this season. There are good episodes but thereâ€™s a lot of talk and very little action or scenes to back it up. â€œConversations With Dead Peopleâ€ is one of my favorite episodes of anything ever. I also like how The First makes a comeback, but unfortunately he/she was never as evil or scary as I wanted him/her to be. Buffy gets it right when she calls The First a â€œtaunt.â€ It just seems to make people creeped out, but never actually causes that much harm â€” except Xanderâ€™s eyeball RIP.
Willow
Buffy

Willowâ€™s arc has been one of the best on â€˜Buffyâ€™ and maybe on all of TV. From her mousy geekiness in season 1 until the powerful, fully-realized witch she is at the end of the show, Willow has certainly grown the most.

Look, we all miss Tara and I definitely think that could have been handled better. I also really resent them replacing her with some more conventionally attractive, younger girl and then ramping up the lesbian sex scenes. (Obvious and cliche.) But Willow herself does a lot of amazing stuff in Season 7 so I forgive her.

And in the finale, when Kennedy says, â€œYouâ€™re a goddess,â€ itâ€™s the perfect summation of Willowâ€™s story. She is a goddess â€” and a powerful, amazing one at that. (Can you tell sheâ€™s my favorite character?)
Anya
Buffy



TC Mark
